projects.name: Yelp with Weather
projects.desc: A full-stack web application where users can search for businesses near them along with the weather associated with the results.

projects.name: Watson Subtitles
projects.desc: Currently working on a program that accurately generates unobtrusive subtitles for videos and audio files using IBM Bluemix's Speech to Text service.

projects.name: Django Gradebook
projects.desc: A gradebook application I created for the purpose of learning how to create larger web applications.

projects.name: My Workspaces
projects.desc: A hackathon project I was the primary developer of. The idea was to make an ERP-like software that combines a chat server like Slack with workspace necessities such as docs, calendar, and tasks.

projects.name: Frontend Projects
projects.desc: Created & recreated many websites from scratch w/ & w/o libraries. Implemented many modern frontend designs and components.

projects.name: Flask Portfolio & Blog
projects.desc: My old web application I created for the purposes of creating a minimal blog engine and portfolio.

projects.name: SF Crime Map
projects.desc: A simple web application that plots all recorded crime incidents within San Francisco. Connected with a backend that allows filtering of data.
